name: Mount Ceres Guest House

reviews.text: My son and I were attending a wedding nearby on May 11th so we booked two rooms for two nights at this lovely house. The owner couldn't have been more helpful and both rooms were extremely comfortable. The house is large and very nicely decorated and the extensive gardens are quite beautiful ... obviously a labour of love. Breakfast was delicious with a good variety of juices, smoothies, cereals, fruits and of course "the full Scottish". Everything we could possibly want was provided and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Mount Ceres.
reviews.title: Perfection!

reviews.text: I stayed at Mount Ceres for one night mid week whilst on a business trip to Edinburgh. Best B&B I have been too. Stunning house and the bedroom was amazing - large, airy and a wonderful bathroom. Everywhere was spotlessly clean. For me, it is always the little extras that make you feel so at home, so the basket of toiletries in the room just incase i'd forgotten anything was lovely.
reviews.title: Best B&B I've been to

reviews.text: The owner was warm and welcoming and nothing was too much bother. She even got me veggie sausages for breakfast! Breakfast served in the conservatory overlooking the garden. And what a garden! It is worth a visit just to see what the owners have done with it!
reviews.title: The BEST!

reviews.text: Breakfast was amazing with fresh fruit, cereal, toast, cooked breakfast, fresh juice, yoghurts.....you certainly wont be disappointed.
reviews.title: A brilliant find, a great place to stay for a visit to Edinburgh

reviews.text: This B&B puts hotels to shame - try it, you'll love it! I am certainly going back.
reviews.title: Wonderful find

aka: Mount Ceres Guest House Lasswade, Scotland
